body_html:
Thank you for your reply. I run nvidia-smi and here is the output.
Mon Mar 13 14:42:23 2017
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| NVIDIA-SMI 375.26 Driver Version: 375.26 |
|-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
| GPU Name Persistence-M| Bus-Id Disp.A | Volatile Uncorr. ECC |
| Fan Temp Perf Pwr:Usage/Cap| Memory-Usage | GPU-Util Compute M. |
|===============================+======================+======================|
| 0 TITAN X (Pascal) On | 0000:01:00.0 On | N/A |
| 36% 57C P2 57W / 250W | 853MiB / 12189MiB | 0% Default |
+-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+

+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Processes: GPU Memory |
| GPU PID Type Process name Usage |
|=============================================================================|
| 0 9695 C .../visics/rdegeest/torch/install/bin/luajit 427MiB |
| 0 16304 G /usr/bin/krunner 2MiB |
| 0 16305 G /usr/bin/plasmashell 59MiB |
| 0 16358 G /usr/bin/korgac 3MiB |
| 0 16633 G /usr/bin/akonadi_archivemail_agent 3MiB |
| 0 16643 G /usr/bin/akonadi_mailfilter_agent 3MiB |
| 0 16651 G /usr/bin/akonadi_newmailnotifier_agent 3MiB |
| 0 16652 G /usr/bin/akonadi_notes_agent 3MiB |
| 0 16656 G /usr/bin/akonadi_sendlater_agent 3MiB |
| 0 16930 G ...nnectMore/Enabled/PreferHtmlOverPlugins/E 210MiB |
| 0 24746 G /usr/libexec/Xorg 131MiB |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+

With the current tensorflow installation, I do not have problem when running it on machines with other type of GPUs. And as you can see here, torch is able to run on this GPU. I feel very confused about this problem.

Thank you for your reply. I run nvidia-smi and here is the output.
Mon Mar 13 14:42:23 2017
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| NVIDIA-SMI 375.26                 Driver Version: 375.26                    |
|-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
| GPU  Name        Persistence-M| Bus-Id        Disp.A | Volatile Uncorr. ECC |
| Fan  Temp  Perf  Pwr:Usage/Cap|         Memory-Usage | GPU-Util  Compute M. |
|===============================+======================+======================|
|   0  TITAN X (Pascal)    On   | 0000:01:00.0      On |                  N/A |
| 36%   57C    P2    57W / 250W |    853MiB / 12189MiB |      0%      Default |
+-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Processes:                                                       GPU Memory |
|  GPU       PID  Type  Process name                               Usage      |
|=============================================================================|
|    0      9695    C   .../visics/rdegeest/torch/install/bin/luajit   427MiB |
|    0     16304    G   /usr/bin/krunner                                 2MiB |
|    0     16305    G   /usr/bin/plasmashell                            59MiB |
|    0     16358    G   /usr/bin/korgac                                  3MiB |
|    0     16633    G   /usr/bin/akonadi_archivemail_agent               3MiB |
|    0     16643    G   /usr/bin/akonadi_mailfilter_agent                3MiB |
|    0     16651    G   /usr/bin/akonadi_newmailnotifier_agent           3MiB |
|    0     16652    G   /usr/bin/akonadi_notes_agent                     3MiB |
|    0     16656    G   /usr/bin/akonadi_sendlater_agent                 3MiB |
|    0     16930    G   ...nnectMore/Enabled/PreferHtmlOverPlugins/E   210MiB |
|    0     24746    G   /usr/libexec/Xorg                              131MiB |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
With the current tensorflow installation, I do not have problem when running it on machines with other type of GPUs. And as you can see here, torch is able to run on this GPU. I feel very confused about this problem.
body:
Thank you for your reply. I run nvidia-smi and here is the output.
Mon Mar 13 14:42:23 2017       
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| NVIDIA-SMI 375.26                 Driver Version: 375.26                    |
|-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
| GPU  Name        Persistence-M| Bus-Id        Disp.A | Volatile Uncorr. ECC |
| Fan  Temp  Perf  Pwr:Usage/Cap|         Memory-Usage | GPU-Util  Compute M. |
|===============================+======================+======================|
|   0  TITAN X (Pascal)    On   | 0000:01:00.0      On |                  N/A |
| 36%   57C    P2    57W / 250W |    853MiB / 12189MiB |      0%      Default |
+-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
                                                                               
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Processes:                                                       GPU Memory |
|  GPU       PID  Type  Process name                               Usage      |
|=============================================================================|
|    0      9695    C   .../visics/rdegeest/torch/install/bin/luajit   427MiB |
|    0     16304    G   /usr/bin/krunner                                 2MiB |
|    0     16305    G   /usr/bin/plasmashell                            59MiB |
|    0     16358    G   /usr/bin/korgac                                  3MiB |
|    0     16633    G   /usr/bin/akonadi_archivemail_agent               3MiB |
|    0     16643    G   /usr/bin/akonadi_mailfilter_agent                3MiB |
|    0     16651    G   /usr/bin/akonadi_newmailnotifier_agent           3MiB |
|    0     16652    G   /usr/bin/akonadi_notes_agent                     3MiB |
|    0     16656    G   /usr/bin/akonadi_sendlater_agent                 3MiB |
|    0     16930    G   ...nnectMore/Enabled/PreferHtmlOverPlugins/E   210MiB |
|    0     24746    G   /usr/libexec/Xorg                              131MiB |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+

With the current tensorflow installation, I do not have problem when running it on machines with other type of GPUs. And as you can see here, torch is able to run on this GPU. I feel very confused about this problem.
